description: Success message shown when a user successfully drags the cloud into position.
Instructional message displayed on the embed widget security drag-drop game
defaultMessage: For security purposes, please drag the white cloud onto the dark cloud. Keyboard users: Press spacebar to grab the cloud, arrow keys to move, and spacebar to drop.

description: Instructional message displayed on the embed widget security drag-drop game for screen readers
defaultMessage: For security purposes, please drag the cloud object onto the target. You are on a {row} by {column} grid with a movable cloud object and a target area. Press spacebar to grab the cloud object, arrow keys to move, and spacebar to drop on the target.

description: Message for the screen reader to tell the current position of the cloud.
Message for the screen reader to tell the position of the target.
Message for the screen reader to tell when user grab the cloud.
Message for the screen reader to tell when user drop the cloud.
Message for the screen reader to tell when the cloud hits the left edge of game board.
Message for the screen reader to tell when the cloud hits the right edge of game board.
Message for the screen reader to tell when the cloud hits the top edge of game board.
Message for the screen reader to tell when the cloud hits the bottom edge of game board.
Message for the screen reader to tell when the white cloud overlaps with the target cloud.
defaultMessage: Target in range, you can drop the cloud object.
